summary.Title: Warehouse worker in Odense SV - starting week 17-18
summary.JobHeadline: Warehouse worker in Odense SV - starting week 17-18
summary.Presentation: With spring at our doorstep and the recent reopening of the country GoWork is now looking for more warehouse workers to work at our clients location in Odense SV. The client is a transport company

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Warehouse worker in Odense SV - starting week 17-18
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
With spring at our doorstep and the recent reopening of the country GoWork is now looking for more warehouse workers to work at our clients location in Odense SV. The client is a transport company that focuses on flowers and outdoor plants.
If you need a job with two to four shifts a week, where being able to work efficiently and in a team is important then this might be the job for you!

The job

As a temp at our client you will be packing and sorting plants and handling any other odd jobs around the warehouse. They work along a tight schedule and you are expected to keep up with the daily deadlines.
Hours and workload will vary depending on the day.

The job requires that you are able to pull your weight and work at a quick pace without it having a negative effect on the quality of your work.

Your profile

You should be able to work at least three days a week during the week days until the end of June.

Beyond that, we expect you to be flexible and committed. It is important that you show up to work on time and that you are a good colleague. You must be able to work well in teams and are the type of worker that stays on site until the job is done.

Hours

Hours per week will vary but expect between 20 and 37 hours per week across three to five shifts.
Usual work hours are between 08:00 - 16:00 or 09:00 - 17:00

Start

First shift and training will be between the 29th of April and 6th of June

The temporary position is expected to last until the end of June, with the possibility for extension.

Salary

153.36 kr/hr
Benefits(Fritvælgstillæg) of 13.75% = 21 kr/hr

About GoWork

GoWork is a temp agency which offers temporary positions within various fields of work. We prioritize the personal experience, and find it important that our clients and temps match well and have a good experience. We work hard to find the best candidates for the respective jobs – candidates with the right attitude.

Application

You can apply for the job on GoWork's website. If there are any questions, you can contact us on 66 10 65 00 between 10:00 and 15:00 o'clock.
